mapper.select: SELECT g.`id`,g.`merchantId`,g.`auditResult`,g.`noPassReason` FROM t_mer_merchant_audit_log g WHERE g.`merchantId` = #{id} ORDER BY g.createdTime DESC

SELECT a.`id`,a.`state`,b.`auditResult`,b.`noPassReason`,c.`noPassField`,c.`noPassReason` FROM t_mer_merchant_info a INNER JOIN t_mer_merchant_audit_log b ON a.`id`=b.`merchantId` INNER JOIN t_mer_merchant_audit_detail c ON a.`id`=c.`merchantId` WHERE a.`id`= #{merchantId}
